regen.absent_element: alerts or notifications for budget thresholds exceeded
regen.new_specification: The system shall alert the user when project budgets exceed predefined thresholds.

regen.absent_element: alert for when project budgets exceed specified limits

regen.absent_element: alerts or notifications for project budget thresholds
